subject: Changing junit.framework.Assert to instance methods
msgSnippet: We had to change all methods in Assert class from static to instance for functional testing, the same approach as JFunc. Is there any benefit for Assert to
messageBody:
We had to change all methods in Assert class from static to instance
for functional testing, the same approach as JFunc. Is there any
benefit for Assert to continue to have static methods in the main
JUnit codeline?

Thanks

David
